p: The mother plants of C. nutans used in this study were purchased from the local nursery located at Kuala Pilah, Negeri Sembilan, Malaysia. Prior to experimentation, the plants were placed and maintained under natural environmental conditions. The C. nutans used in this study were deposited at the herbarium of the Biodiversity Unit, Institute of Bioscience, Universiti Putra Malaysia with a voucher number of MFI 0015/18.
